thread.title: Why are they even at the game??
thread.title_full: Why are they even at the game??

author: Shaggy
title: Why are they even at the game??
text: Why are they even at the game?? Not one of these girls is watching the game. https://www.youtube.com/watch?t=122&v=_a_pxcoFAvQ Like, the, oh my god, like, dumbing down, like, oh my god, like, of, like, America. Oh my god. I know that every generation of teens and 20-somethings since the 1950's have had their own language, but it seems that it's getting dumber every generation. Yes, I know that the actual definition of "dumb" is the inability to speak. Hmmm. And they are the next generation of parents. I am a political centrist, but I do believe that the lack of seriousness among each generation of kids reflects a "What does it matter?" mentality due to political gridlock and the threat of nuclear war in the hands of second-rate nations. Here is an interesting article detailing how our country is becoming a second-rate country. All hell will break loose when European countries decide that the American dollar will no longer be the world standard. Our government will no longer be able to print up money with nothing to back it up. Like, oh my god, like. http://mic.com/articles/87203/within...nd-rate-nation And now back to baseball. The D-backs are losing to the Astros 7-1. Hill, playing 3B, made an error on an easy grounder in the very first play. Then he didn't budge on a ball hit to his left. It is time to move the old man.
